Scientific Steel Structures (3S) / Biga - Çanakkale

Previous Next

SCIENTIFIC STEEL STRUCTURES (3S) is an industrial plants fabricator, engineering house and field erection team under one roof with a focus for Worldwide coverage. With more than 40 years’ experience portfolio of the owners 3S is a dynamic yet mature organization. We engineer and fabricate as per ASME, ISO, CE standards. SCIENTIFIC STEEL STRUCTURES fabrication is conducted at our Biga plant in Canakkale Turkey, which is equipped with the state of the art machinery and technology.    Placed in the prestigious Biga Industrial Zone 3S plant is only 19 km from the Biga commercial port and 1 km from the Bursa – Çanakkale main road.

For more information please visit the website
